Room.Name: Small Ring
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing in the middle of the rightmost ring of the Carnival.
Room.LongDescription: You are standing in the center of the right ring, among several acrobat and clowns. Soon you get in the mood to amuse people and start doing what the others do. The audience is very excited and shows you with its thundering applause that you could be as good a clown as you are an adventurer. You, yourself, notice for the first time how good you are in standing on your head. The whole world seem to be in your feet and you have reached the top of it...
